metadata.title: Anime Collection
metadata.description: Comprehensive anime dataset with demographics, genres, studios, and MyAnimeList integration for tracking your anime journey.
metadata.author: R3VISIT

content_type.name: Animes
content_type.description: All the anime that have captured my imagination.

demo_data.name: One Piece
demo_data.description: Monkey D. Luffy sets off on his adventure to find the legendary treasure One Piece and become the next Pirate King.

metadata.plot: Gol D. Roger was known as the Pirate King, the strongest and most infamous being to have sailed the Grand Line. The capture and death of Roger by the World Government brought a change throughout the world. His last words before his death revealed the location of the greatest treasure in the world, One Piece.

demo_data.name: Fruits Basket
demo_data.description: After her mother's death, Tohru Honda finds herself living with the mysterious Sohma family, who are cursed to turn into zodiac animals.

metadata.plot: Tohru Honda was living a normal life... until one day she discovers that many members of the Sohma family turn into zodiac animals of the Chinese zodiac when they are hugged by the opposite sex or when their bodies come under a great deal of stress.

demo_data.name: Kaguya-sama: Love is War
demo_data.description: Two student council members engage in psychological warfare to make the other confess their love first.

metadata.original-title: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen
metadata.plot: At the renowned Shuchiin Academy, Miyuki Shirogane and Kaguya Shinomiya are the student body's top representatives. Ranked the top student in the nation and respected by peers and mentors alike, Miyuki serves as the student council president.

demo_data.name: Monster
demo_data.description: A Japanese surgeon living in Germany must track down a psychopathic killer he once saved as a child.

metadata.plot: Dr. Kenzo Tenma is a renowned brain surgeon of Japanese descent working in Europe. Highly lauded by his peers as one of the great young minds that will revolutionize the field, he is blessed with a beautiful fiancé and is on the cusp of a big promotion in the hospital he works at.

demo_data.name: Bakemonogatari
demo_data.description: Koyomi Araragi encounters various supernatural phenomena and helps girls with their mysterious problems.

metadata.plot: Koyomi Araragi, a third year high school student, manages to survive a vampire attack with the help of Meme Oshino, a strange man residing in an abandoned building. Though being saved from vampirism and now a human again, several side effects such as superhuman healing abilities and enhanced vision still remain.

demo_data.name: Violet Evergarden
demo_data.description: A former child soldier learns about emotions and what it means to love through her work as an Auto Memory Doll.

metadata.plot: There are words Violet heard on the battlefield, which she cannot forget. These words were given to her by someone she holds dear, more than anyone else. She does not yet know their meaning. A certain point in time, in the continent of Telesis.

demo_data.name: Your Name
demo_data.description: Two teenagers discover they are mysteriously swapping bodies and must find each other before it's too late.

metadata.plot: Mitsuha Miyamizu, a high school girl, yearns to live the life of a boy in the bustling city of Tokyo—a dream that stands in stark contrast to her present life in the countryside. Meanwhile in the city, Taki Tachibana lives a busy life as a high school student while juggling his part-time job and hopes for a future in architecture.

demo_data.name: Jujutsu Kaisen
demo_data.description: High school student Yuji Itadori swallows a cursed finger and becomes host to a powerful Curse, joining a secret organization to fight evil spirits.

metadata.plot: Idly indulging in baseless paranormal activities with the Occult Club, high schooler Yuuji Itadori spends his days at either the clubroom or the hospital, where he visits his bedridden grandfather. However, this leisurely lifestyle soon takes a turn for the strange when he unknowingly encounters a cursed item.

demo_data.name: Claymore
demo_data.description: Half-human, half-demon warriors called Claymores fight against shape-shifting demons called Yoma in a medieval world.

metadata.plot: When a shapeshifting demon with a thirst for human flesh, known as a "youma," arrives in Raki's village, a lone woman with silver eyes walks into town with only a sword upon her back. She is a "Claymore," a being manufactured as half-human and half-youma, for the express purpose of exterminating these monsters.

demo_data.name: The Master of Diabolism
demo_data.description: Wei Wuxian, once feared as the Master of Diabolism, is reincarnated and must uncover the truth behind his past death.

metadata.plot: Wei Wuxian was once one of the most outstanding men of his generation, a talented and clever young cultivator who harnessed martial arts, knowledge, and spirituality into powerful abilities. But when the horrors of war led him to seek a new power through demonic cultivation, the world's respect for his skills turned to fear, and his eventual death was celebrated throughout the land.
